63027.summary: Some customers in the South Poplar & Mill Lake areas of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63027.title: June 23 - Abbotsford (South Poplar & Mill Lake) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
